reporter-output.line: <font color='Black'>Launching 'chrome' browser in local...</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Navigating to URL : https://demo.midtrans.com/</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for buy button' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'buyButton is being clicked here'</font></br>
<font color='Green'>Verified 'Side Bar Show'</font></br>
Screenshot:- testCheckout_2025-05-27_16-42-23.png
Page URL:- https://demo.midtrans.com/
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for checkout button' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'checkoutButton is being clicked here'</font></br>
<font color='Black'>✅ Berhasil switch ke iframe snap-midtrans</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with id:bank_transfer</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for virtual account list' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'virtualAccountList is being clicked here'</font></br>
<font color='Black'>✅ Berhasil switch ke iframe snap-midtrans</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with xPath://a[@href='#/bank-transfer/bca-va']</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for virtual account' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'virtualAccountPayment is being clicked here'</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with id:vaField</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with css:div.float-right.clickable.copy</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for Copy button' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'Copy button clicked'</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with id:inputMerchantId</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for va number input' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'inputVirtualAccountNumber is being clicked here'</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with css:input[type='submit'][value='Inquire']</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for Inquire button' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'Inquire button is being clicked'</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with css:p.markdown-p.inputed-form</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with css:input[type='submit'][value='Pay']</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for pay button' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'Pay button is being clicked'</font></br>
<font color='Black'>✅ Berhasil switch ke iframe snap-midtrans</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Get the WebElement with css:button.btn.full.primary.btn-theme</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Started waiting for 'waiting for Check Status button' to be clickable</font></br>
<font color='Black'>Click on 'Check Status button clicked'</font></br>
Screenshot:- testCheckout_2025-05-27_16-42-57.png
Page URL:- https://demo.midtrans.com/
<font color='Black'>Browser is closed now.</font></br>
